title: Bind WHY STOP MUSIC GROUP hub + silhouette logos exclusively to logo2-1.png

requirements.summary: Ensure both the centered hub logo and background silhouette logo use logo2-1.png and remove any logo2.png bindings.
acceptanceCriteria: The centered hub logo renders using logo2-1.png.
The background silhouette logo renders using logo2-1.png.
There are no references to logo2.png in the code paths that bind/render these two logos.

file_operations.description: Create a centralized, single-source constant for the hub and silhouette logo filename set to "logo2-1.png" to prevent accidental reintroduction of "logo2.png" references.
Replace the hardcoded hub logo src with the centralized constant from frontend/src/utils/logoAssetFilenames.ts and ensure the binding remains "logo2-1.png" (no "logo2.png" references).
Replace the hardcoded silhouette logo src with the centralized constant from frontend/src/utils/logoAssetFilenames.ts and ensure the binding remains "logo2-1.png" (no "logo2.png" references).
Confirm required asset validation includes "logo2-1.png" (and does not add or depend on "logo2.png") so the asset scan/overlays validate the correct uploaded logo.
Ensure the known-asset normalization logic continues to normalize only the required assets list (including "logo2-1.png") and does not introduce any handling or references to "logo2.png".
